## Loading Libraries for including .qmd files

```{r}
library(quarto)
library(here)

```

# Loading of Data and Data Wrangling 

## Including Load file (01_load)

```{r}
#| output: false

quarto_render(here("R/01_load.qmd"))
```

{{< include 01_load.qmd >}}

```{r}
file.rename(here("R/01_load.html"), here("results/01_load.html"))
```
